scenario_text.value:
How long is fifty years, Takuma?
I can’t imagine it.

I don’t know, either. Still, those fifty
years weren’t just long for Renamon...
They must have been tough for her, too.

I don’t think so! Miyuki was with Renamon the
whole time!

I think Renamon must’ve been happy.
She wasn’t alone, after all!

Yeah, you’re right, Agumon.
She wasn’t alone.
Are you happy to be with me, Takuma?
Of course!

Eh heh heh... Well, good!
...Hey, Takuma?
Well you stay with me from now on, too?
I’ll stay...
With you.
If it’s right.
With everyone.

I’ll stay with you. More importantly, will
you stay with me, Agumon?

Yeah! Forever and ever!
I’ll always be with you!

I’ll stay if it’s the right call...
Yeah, I’ll always be with you.
Why wouldn’t it be! You and me together...
Has to be the right thing for sure!
I’ll stay with everyone. Not just us...
We should all stay together from now on.
Yeah! I like everyone else, too!
That’s why I want to be with you all!

Our time in this world has been short, but...
I got to meet you, so it’s precious to me.

I’ve loved the time we’ve been together,
Takuma!
Thanks... You’re like my other half, Agumon.

I don’t get complicated things like this,
but to me...
You’re my destiny!

Sounds like something a lover would say.
Still, it’s surprisingly fitting here.

It’s safe to say someone I consider my other
half would be destined for me.

I think you and me can handle anything that
comes our way.
What do you think, Takuma?
Well...
You’re right.
I’ll remember us all.
Stick with me.
I think you’re right. We can handle anything.

Even saving Miyuki...
You’ll help me, won’t you, Agumon?
Of course! We’ll save everything, together!
Yeah! Let’s save it all!

I think you should remember everyone else is
here, too. If it’s all of us...
We can handle anything.

Yeah! Together, with everyone else we’re...
Um, a force to be second with?
I...think you mean “reckoned” with.

Yeah, reckoned!
A force to be “reckoned” with!

I think you should stick with me. I can deal
with anything if you’re around.
Sure! I’ll stick with you!
You and I can handle it all!
Yeah! We can handle it!

(Agumon and I are connected.
That’s why we can do anything!)
